---

## Metrics and Impact

### Revenue & Pipeline Growth
*   **$55M Pipeline Acceleration (Veranex):** Generated **$55M in marketing-attributed pipeline** over a 6-month period.
    *   **Attribution:** Measured via Salesforce "Point of Origin" (First-Touch) tagging, isolating pipeline specifically generated by marketing activities versus sales prospecting.
*   **$6M Annual Recurring Revenue (Zebra):** Created a new SaaS business line generating **$6M annually**.
    *   **Profitability:** Achieved **80%+ profit margins** (significantly higher than standard services margins) by leveraging billable client projects to fund core product development, leaving only maintenance and white-labeling as ongoing costs.

### Conversion & Digital Performance
*   **1400% Conversion Rate Improvement (Veranex):** Increased website conversion rate from **0.001% to 1.4%**.
    *   **Lead Volume:** Scaled lead generation from near-zero to **60-70 qualified leads per month**.
    *   **Business Value:** This conversion spike was the primary driver of the $55M pipeline increase.
*   **Shipping Velocity (Veranex):** Increased "Time to Market" for digital updates by **50%**.
    *   **Measurement:** Tracked via Asana/Smartsheet cycle times, measuring the reduction in time required to ship website changes and marketing materials from request to deployment.

### Client Retention & Delivery Excellence
*   **85% Client Retention (ITR Mobility):** Achieved an 85% retention rate, defined by **contract renewals and project extensions**.
    *   **Driver:** Implementation of a "Client Success Framework" and rigorous client satisfaction surveying.
*   **Zero Scope Failures (Veranex UX):** Delivered 100% of projects on time with **zero unmanaged scope creep**.
    *   **Methodology:** Achieved through rigorous upfront scope definition and effective Change Order management. Any minor scope adjustments were proactively managed within the original timeline to ensure client agreement and on-time delivery.
